EmailTemplate.description: Letter to PN1-2 and Nursery parents about settling in school.
EmailTemplate.name: Settling in Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Settling in policy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The British School of Tashkent Part of The British Schools Group
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Attached we are sending you a letter about settling in period for children of Pre-Nursery 1, Pre-Nursery 2 & Nursery class.
Looking forward to see you all on Monday, September, 3rd
Regards,
Уважаемые родители,
В приложении, пожалуйста, найдите письмо об адаптационном периоде для учеников классов Pre-Nursery 1, Pre-Nursery 2 и Nursery.
C нетерпением ждем встречи с Вами в понедельник, 3 сентября.
С наилучшими пожеланиями,
Regards,
Administration Team The British School of Tashkent World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Beijing - Kuala Lumpur - Sao Paulo - Manila - Moscow - Guangzhou - Nanjing - Tashkent - Pamplona -Marbella
